programme.title: Curious George
Znatiželjni George
programme.desc:
Curious George: Directed by Matthew O'Callaghan. With Frank Welker, Will Ferrell, Shane Baumel, Timyra-Joi Beatty. The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381971/","name":"Curious George","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODIxNzYxNDEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA1NTM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381971/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"richa333"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Fun for everyone with a young heart!","reviewBody":"From the very first moment that Curious George scampers onto the screen to begin his funny adventures, my heart was swept away with laughter. All my cares disappeared while my wife and I giggled with all the other kids, very young and very old, watching George do his best to do the right thing  only to get in more and more trouble from the adult animals all around. Soon George (a 'monkey'  actually a chimpanzee) finds better times with the animal children, whom he gathers around a chameleon that they light up like a rainbow disco strobe.

Sounds silly? It sure is, and more fun than an elephant with a smiley face painted by George on its butt! (Everyone screamed with laughter at that one.) Within less time than it takes George to settle down for the night, all alone, we're not watching a movie  we're living the adventure with him. For those who have read the Curious George books, you know (or soon remember) how the story goes. For those adults or kids who haven't read the books yet, let the story sweep you away.

For those interested in such curious things: this movie is animated, hand-drawn in vibrant primary colors with fun background music by Jack Johnson. It's faithful to the spirit and drawings of Margret and H.A. Rey who created the Curious George books. If you have any youth in your heart, you will be delightfully swept away by the good ship H.A. Rey into the antic-filled, lovely and gentle world of Curious George and his new family.

I had a gentle, fun good time seeing this movie with my wife (a grandma). So did the preview theater, full not only with kids of all ages with their parents & grandparents, but a couple in their 20's on a date! This is a really gentle, really good movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-02-10","keywords":"cell phone photograph,animal character name as title,curious george the monkey character,no opening credits,part computer animation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506405/","name":"Eugene Levy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639965/","name":"Matthew O'Callaghan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0682784/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442190/","name":"Ken Kaufman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108273/","name":"Mike Werb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597712/","name":"Margret Rey"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

National Lampoon's European Vacation: Directed by Amy Heckerling. With Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Dana Hill, Jason Lively. The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089670/","name":"National Lampoon's European Vacation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJhZTBlZDQtZGFjNC00OTU1LWFmNDMtZmQ5YzllYzk2NGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"allyatherton"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun movie to see in the New Year.","reviewBody":"What happens when a moron takes a road trip around Europe.

Starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Dana Hill and Jason Lively.

Written by John Hughes and Robert Klane,

Directed by Amy Heckerling.

I chose this oldie to watch on New Year's Eve with my family.

It's a fun movie and kept us entertained while we waited for Big Ben to chime in the new year. We all had a good chuckle and I think we all enjoyed it. I don't know what was funnier, the script or the eighties clothes!

A fun way to see in the New Year,

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
Nemoguća Misija: Otpadnička Nacija
programme.desc: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation: Directed by Christopher McQuarrie. With Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg, Rebecca Ferguson. Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2381249/","name":"Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTFmNDA3ZjMtN2Y0MC00NDYyLWFlY2UtNTQ4OTQxMmY1NmVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTg4NDQ4NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2381249/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lucasespindola-91322"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Greatness, once again","reviewBody":"The first scene perfectly captures the movie: fast and jaw-dropping. It is an action packed movie, and it is goddamn good. It shows how rare a franchise like MI is, being the fourth great movie (and third in a row) in the series. Cruise's chemistry with everyone is as fluid as ever and the team feels more mature and, at the same time, more interesting. Solomon Lane is a great antagonist and there is no denying Sean Harris gets a well deserved second best villain in the franchise, only after legendary Philip Seymour Hoffman. programme.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Lopovi, ubojice i dvije nabijene puške
programme.desc:
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham. Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120735/","name":"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAyN2JmZmEtNjAyMy00NzYwLThmY2MtYWQ3OGNhNjExMmM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120735/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"doktor d"},"dateCreated":"2003-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"The essence of late 90's cinema -- hip, highly stylized, VISUAL","reviewBody":"Guy Ritchie's hip, highly stylized 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is a truly remarkable film, not only for its appropriately pyrotechnic camera work, but also for its seemingly flawless, puzzle-perfect script/screenplay. While the picture's main focus is on a group of lads who invest money in a high-stakes, rigged card game and lose, the broader story concerns approximately eight different groups of criminals whose paths cross (more> than once, in some cases) during various illegal pursuits: money, guns, drugs, even revenge. The film is quite violent, both on and off screen, but it's also uniformly humorous throughout. It's important to note that the four central characters (a cook, a card sharp, and a couple of guys who sell "discounted" items) are interested only in acquiring the money to pay off their enormous debt; they kill no one. The same applies to the laid-back college boys who "grow copious amounts of ganja".

 The cast is comprised of mostly young, veteran, male actors. In fact, the only female in the film doesn't even speak, though she handles a machine gun fairly well. Sting appears briefly in several scenes as a bar-owning father figure. While his secondary performance is solid, as usual, it is also unmemorable. The soundtrack is first-rate, from the 60's hits of James Brown to the contemporary beats of London's underground. The groovy, pulsating music and lyrics are often succinctly synchronized with the action and dialogue in the film, creating a theatrical rhythm that is fairly uncommon in cinema (from any period).

 Critics and audiences over the years have often dismissed stylized camera work as pretentious and unnecessary, stating that it detracts from the story, bogs it down, or pads it; however, the film medium has the luxury of actually "displaying" a story for its audience, unlike the written word alone. It's what the medium is all about -- it's VISUAL. Hence, one of the reasons a filmmaker chooses such visual displays is to "brand" his or her work, in the same way as writers like Cummings, Hemingway or Joyce did with their medium. It's hard to imagine a cinema without Hitchcock, Kubrick, or Scorsese to represent it. To this end, Ritchie has taken his first step in establishing his own brand. His energetic, ultra-contemporary camera work incorporates (through a fresh perspective) such devices as slow motion, fast motion, and freeze-frame coupled with narration. It is at times reminiscent of (and actually expands upon) Martin Scorsese's patented visual stylistics and camera movements, like those found in 'Mean Streets' and 'Goodfellas'. But the similarities with Scorsese's work end there.

 Critics' endless comparisons of Ritchie's film with the works of Quentin Tarantino and Danny Boyle's 'Trainspotting' stand mostly unwarranted, as these comparisons take away from the inventiveness and originality of 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels'. Ritchie's film is a much more involved, complex, layered work than the aforementioned comparisons. While Tarantino's films are very strong on dialogue, screenplay, and editing, they often lack creative camera work and direction. Boyle's 'Trainspotting' does have a resembling "feel" to 'LS&TSB', but aside from its Great Britain origins, there really is no need for comparison. 'Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels' is essential viewing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":558819,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1998-08-28","keywords":"gangster,dark comedy,violence,united kingdom,shotgun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lock, Stock, And Two Smoking Barrels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2274558233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTYyMzdmNTUtMmMxMS00NTFmLWFjNzItMzAxNDVlZThkZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from PolyGram Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002077/","name":"Dexter Fletcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0602941/","name":"Nick Moran"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024369/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000750/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mbretër të rrugës II
programme.desc: Ray Liotta, Clifton Powell. Në rrugët e dhunshme të Detroitit, dikush po vret një e nga një oficerët e policisë dhe dy hetues do të futen në një botë të rrezikshme korrupsioni për të zbuluar të vërtetën...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Ferri në kufi
programme.desc: 2019. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të jashtëzakonshme të Marshallit të parë afro-amerikan në Perëndimin e egër. Bas Rivs përpiqet të vërtetojë vlerat e tij duke iu vënë pas një krimineli famëkeq, por veç plumbave përballet me diskriminimin e rëndë.
programme.category: Aksion
uestern

programme.title: Djemtë e këqinj: Filmi
programme.desc: Pasi një grup kriminelësh arrijnë të arratisen gjatë transportit për në burg, Detektivi Oh Goo Tak duhet të grumbullojë një ekip special për të pastruar edhe një herë qytetin nga keqbërësit.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Siguri maksimale
programme.desc: Steven Seagal, Steve Austin. Dy ish ushtarë të forcave speciale, në mbrojtje të dy femrave të burgosura, detyrohen të përballen me një ushtri mercenarësh, të cilët kërkojnë me çdo kusht eliminimin e vajzave...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Burrat me të zeza I
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith. Dy super-agjente ne ndjekje te terroristeve aliene qe rrezikojne t'i japin fund botes. Nje perzierje humori, betejash masive dhe efektesh speciale.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkence

programme.title: Zodiaku kinez
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Oliver Platt. Një gjuetar thesaresh dhe skuadra e tij fillojnë një aventurë ndërkombëtare në kërkim të një koke bornzi, që është një nga 12 shenjat e zodiakut kinez.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Hanxhari
programme.desc: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Jessica Alba, Robert De Niro. Një ish agjent federal i futur në kurth për vrasjen e një senatori, vendos të fillojë një hakmarrje të pamëshirshme kundër të gjithë fajtorëve...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Pakoja
programme.desc: 2013. Steve Austin, Dolph Lundgren. Vrasës profesionistë kërkojnë te ndalin me çdo kusht korrierin e besuar të një mafiozi, i cili është ngarkuar me misionin e dërgimit të një pakoje misterioze tek një kriminel që nuk njihet nga askush.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Intervistë me vrasësin
programme.desc: Luke Goss, Caroline Tillette. Mos i beso askujt. Kontrollo ndjenjat dhe mos u dorëzo kurrë. Kjo është motoja e Viktorit, një vrasës profesionist. Por as ai s'i shpëton dot së shkuarës. Tani është koha të përballet me të..
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Arratisje nga hapësira
programme.desc: G.Pearce. Në të ardhmen e afërt një njeri i akuzuar padrejtësisht për vrasje, ka vetem 1 mundësi për të fituar lirinë. Ai duhet të ndërmarrë një mision pothuajse të pamundur për të shpëtuar vajzën e Presidentit, e cila është marrë peng...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Bija e ujkut
programme.desc: Pasi i biri rrëmbehet, në vend që të kërkojë ndihmë, një ushatarake veterane merr peng njërin prej rrëmbyesve dhe e detyron të ndërmarrin një udhëtim të rrezikshëm, për të shpëtuar djalin nga kthetrat e liderit misterioz të bandës.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Identitet i humbur
programme.desc: Taylor Lautner, Alfred Molina. Pasi sheh veten në një faqe interneti per njerëzit e humbur, një adoleshent zbulon, se jeta e tij ka qënë një mashtrim. Ai vendos të arratiset dhe fillon të hetojë mbi të kaluarën e tij të mistershme...
programme.category: Aksion
mister

programme.title: Capi
programme.desc: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel. Historia e Çapit, një roboti të ngarkuar me inteligjencë artificiale, i cili rrëmbehet nga dy kriminelë për ta përdorur për qëllimet e tyre të errëta...
programme.category: Aksion
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Në jetën e Çarlit
programme.desc: Çarli, një 18 vjeçar problematik, sapo është larguar nga qendra e rehabilitimit për varësinë nga droga. Por kur prindërit e detyrojnë të futet në një qendër për të rritur, ai takohet me një vajzë me të njëjtin problem, e cila mund t'i ndryshojë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Sofia dhe dielli i mëngjesit
programme.desc: Në vjeshtën e vitit 1941, ardhja e një të huaji misterioz në një qytet të vogël të Karolinës së Jugut, provokon banorët e zonës dhe ndez një romancë të ndaluar.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Fat i paparashikuar
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2004. Jennifer Love Hewitt. Pas një zënke, që për pak i çoi drejt ndarjes, e dashura e Ianit, Samanta, vdes në një aksident rrugor. Por, fati i jep mundësinë të rikthehet në kohë, me shpresën për të ndryshuar ngjarjen fatale.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Përmes Universit
programme.desc: Evan Rachel Wood, Jim Sturgess. Nën sfondin e këngëve të Beatles dhe protestave kundër luftës në Vietnam, vjen historia e dashurisë midis një vajze të pasur amerikane dhe një artisti të varfër anglez.
programme.category: Dramë romantike
muzikë

programme.title: Kush është Klark Rokfeleri?
programme.desc: Eric McCormack, Regina Taylor. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të shtetasit gjerman Christian Karl Gerhartsreiter, i cili arriti të shtirej për shumë vite si një nga anëtarët e familjes së njohur Rokfeler...
programme.category: Biografi
krim

programme.title: Vlerësimi
programme.desc: Anna Gunn, James Purefoy. Nje financiere që po bën gjithçka për të ngjitur shkallët e suksesit në botën e pafalshme të Wall Street, rrezikon gjithçka kur prezanton një kompani të re...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dy fytyrat e sime motre
programme.desc: Kristin Davis, Tammy Blanchard. Historia prekëse e marrëdhënies së ndërlikuar midis një gruaje dhe motrës së saj, e cila vuan nga skizofrenia.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Përjetësisht në pritje
programme.desc: Rachel Bilson, Tom Sturridge. Një i ri, i cili gjithë jetën ka pritur për vajzën që dashuron, ribashkohet me të pas shumë vitesh, por e kaluara e saj shumë ndryshe do të vendosë gjithçka në dilemë.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Njeriu i përgjigjeve
programme.desc: Jeff Daniels, Lauren Graham, Lou Taylor Pucci. Një nënë beqare dhe një i ri me probleme të shumta, kërkojnë këshilla nga një shkrimtar i mbyllur në vetvete, autor i librit më të suksesshëm spiritual...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Pse u martova?
programme.desc: Tyler Perry, Janet Jackson, Michael Jai White. Martesa në kohët e sotme është një 'marrëveshje' e vështirë. Këto janë sprovat dhe telashet e disa çifteve me pushime në një resort luksoz dhe një sekreti, që mund të rrënojë gjithçka...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Ujë për Elefantët
programme.desc: Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon. I shkatërruar nga vdekja e prindërve, një student veterinarie, i bashkohet një cirku të njohur dhe bie në dashuri me akrobaten kryesore. Por gjithçka rrezikohet nga burri i saj, pronar i cirkut...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Qëndresa e një gruaje
programme.desc: Julianne Moore, Woody Harrelson, Laura Dern. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Një grua, nënë e 10-të fëmijëve dhe bashkëshorte e një burri problematik, bën të pamundurën për t'u kujdesur për gjithë familjen...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: America
programme.desc: Rosie O'Donnell, Philip Johnson. Një psikiatre ndihmon një adoleshent me ngjyrë, i cili është rritur nëpër shtëpitë e fëmijëve, për të gjetur gjënë e vetme që i ka mbetur në jetë... shpresën.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dashuri në kohëra të rrezikshme
programme.desc: Me botën që mbyllet gradualisht prej pandemisë, dy të rinj që njihen në një aplikacion për beqarë, fillojnë të gjejnë mbështetje tek njëri-tjetri ndërsa përpiqen t'i japin një shpjegim kohës së vështirë në të cilën po jetojnë. Një histori moderne dashurie.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Anonim
programme.desc: Rhys Ifans, Vanessa Redgrave. Ndërkohë që oborri mbretëror i Elizabes së Parë përfshihet nga intrigat, një aktor i ri William Shakespeare, del në skenë si një shkrimtar i madh. Por a është ai autori i vërtetë i këtyre kryeveprave?
programme.category: Dramë historike

programme.title: Forca e luftëtarit
programme.desc: Nick Nolte, Scott Mechlowicz. Bazuar në një histori të vëretë. Një i panjohur misterioz, inkurajon një atlelet të talentuar që ëndërron të marrë pjesë në lojërat Olimpike, që ta shohë të ardhmen me një tjetër këndvështrim.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: 6 Vjet
programme.desc: Ndërsa i afrohen diplomimit, një çift i ri, i bashkuar prej 6 vitesh nga një dashuri idealiste, fillon të përçahet kur mundësi të reja karriere shfaqen papriur.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Dy botët tona
programme.desc: Një stjuardesë cinike me varësi nga alkooli dhe një djalë gjeni pakistanezo - amerikan, krijojnë një miqësi të fortë ndërsa përpiqen të gjejnë babanë e tij, në kaosin e krijuar pas sulmeve të 11 shtatorit 2011.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Deri në fund
programme.desc: Bryan Cranston. Lyndon B. Johnson bëhet Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara pas pasojave kaotike të vrasjes së John. F. Kennedy dhe shpenzon vitin e tij të parë në detyrë për të kaluar sa më shpejt Aktin e të Drejtave Civile.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: All eyez on me:Legjenda e Tupak Shakur
programme.desc: Historia e pathënë e reperit, aktorit, poetit dhe aktivitstit Tupak Shakur, nisur nga ditët e para në Nju Jork, deri në shndërrimin e një prej zërave më me influencë në të gjithë botën, dhe vdekjes së parakohëshme në moshën 25-vjeçare.
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Gruaja e udhëtarit të kohës
programme.desc: Eric Bana, Rachel McAdams. Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Audrey Niffenegger. Kjo është historia e nje njeriu, i cili vuan nga një anomali gjenetike që e bën të udhëtojë në kohë dhe ndërlikimet që kjo sjell në martesën e tij...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Prapësia
programme.desc: Keira Knightley. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Konkursi 'Miss Bota', 1970 bëri histori pasi Lëvizja e Çlirimit të Grave prishi transmetimin e drejtpërdrejtë. Por kur shfaqja rifilloi, shpallja e fitueses shkaktoi zhurmë akoma më të madhe.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë
histori

programme.title: Kënga e emrave
programme.desc: Tim Roth, Clive Owen. 35 vjet pasi miku i tij i fëmijërisë, një violinist virtuoz, zhduket para koncertit të tij solo, Martin Simmonds nis një kërkim obsesiv kur mëson se ai mund të jetë akoma gjallë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Arrëthyesi dhe katër mbretërit
programme.desc: Keira Knightley, Mackenzie Foy, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman. Kur e ëma e ndjerë i lë Klarës një dhuratë misterioze, ajo nis një udhëtim drejt 4 mbretërive sekrete ku zbulon se zotëron fuqinë për të ndryshuar botën...
programme.category: Fantazi
aventurë

programme.title: Grabitje mes stuhisë
programme.desc: Emile Hirsch, Mel Gibson, Kate Bosworth. Një bandë hajdutësh që planifikojnë të ekzekutojnë një vjedhje mes një uragani, hasin telashe kur një polic detyron të gjithë banorët të evakuojnë ndërtesën.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Bashkëshorti i rremë
programme.desc: Anna Faris, Eugenio Derbez, Eva Longoria. Rivënie e filmit ikonë të viteve '80. Kur Leo, një burrë i pasur dhe egoist bie nga jahti dhe zgjohet me amnezi, Kejti shtiret si gruaja e tij për tu hakmarrje ndaj pushimit pa arsye nga puna...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Në një lagje të Nju Jorkut
programme.desc: Anthony Ramos. Usnavi, djali i dy emigrantëve Domenikanë në Nju Jork, është në dilemë: të mbyll dyqanin që zotëron dhe të rikthehet në Republikën Domenikane për të hapur një lokal buzë detit apo të qëndrojë në Nju Jork.
programme.category: Dramë
musikal
romancë

programme.title: Engjëjt e Çarlit
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott, Ella Balinska. Vajzave të reja të 'Engjëvje të Çarlit' u mbetet të mbështeten vetëm tek njëra tjetra në një mision, që bëhet aq i pabesë sa dhe personave më pranë tyre nuk mund t'u besohet më.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Babai i nuses 2
programme.desc: Kur e bija t'i jape lajmin e gezuar se pret nje femije, ai do ta humbase krejt. Ndjehet ende teper i ri per t'u quajtur gjysh dhe teper krenar per te pranuar se tashme i ka hyre krizes se moshes se mesme.
programme.category: Steve Martin

programme.title: Skeçe: Aldo, Giovanni, Giacomo
programme.desc: Treshja e komedianëve me 10 prej skeçeve të tyre më të mirë dhe role si: 3 binjakë të palindur, alpinistë, udhëtues në hapësirë dhe ngarkues kafshësh në varkën e Noes...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Kung Fu Banda
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2004. Në Kinën e viteve 40-të, një i ri kërkon të bashkohet me bandën më të madhe në qytet. Problemi është se nuk ia thotë fare dhe shumë shpejt paaftësia e tij do t'i hapë një mal me telashe gjithë qytetit.
programme.category: Komedi/Arte marciale

programme.title: Çdo ditë nga e para
programme.desc: Historia e nje meteorologu i cili pas nje stuhie ka ngecur ne diten me te keqe te jetes se tij. Fillimisht duket disi i shqetesuar, por me pas fillon te zbuloje se çdo te thote te jetosh jeten kur e nesermja s'ekziston.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: I urrej fëmijët
programme.desc: 2019. Një shkrimtar që u bë i famshëm prej librit të tij "I urrej fëmijët", mëson se është babai i një 13-vjeçari në kërkim të prindërve biologjikë. Tani, ai duhet të ritakojë të gjitha ish të dashurat për të gjetur se cila është mamaja e tij...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Klubi i grave të para
programme.desc: Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn, Diane Keaton. Tre shoqe të vjetra, të divorcuara, ritakohen pas shumë vitesh dhe vendosin të hakmerren ndaj bashkëshorteve të tyre të cilët i braktisën për gra më të reja.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Klubi i librit
programme.desc: 2018. Diane Keaton, Jane Fonda, Candice Bergen, Mary Steenburgen. Jetët e katër mikeshave të vjetra kthehen përmbys pasi lexojnë librin e shumëpërfolur '50 hijet e Greit' në klubin e tyre të librit...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Goditje rrufeje
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Luisa Ranieri. Nuk ka rëndësi kush je apo nga vjen, dashurisë me shikim të parë nuk mund t'i shmangesh. Një prift që s'është vërtet prift bie në dashuri, gjithashtu një ambasador njihet me vajzën e tij të ëndrrave...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Gërmadhat
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Një grup miqsh me pushime në Meksikë, vendosin të eksplorojnë gërmadhat e një qyteti të vjetër dhe zbulojnë se diçka vdekjeprurëse jeton e fshehur poshtë këtij misteri mijëra vjeçar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Tatuisti
programme.desc: Jason Behr, Mia Blake. Përpjekjet e nje të riu për të mësuar artin e tatuazheve Samoa, çlirojnë një shpirt vdekjeprurës. Ndërkohë që klientët e tij po vdesin një e nga një, ai duhet të gjejë një zgjidhje për të shpëtuar të dashurën.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Hajdutët e shpresës
programme.desc: Tre fëmijë nga lagjet e varfra të Brazilit, marrin arratinë pasi në mbeturinat e qytetit gjejnë një portofol që provon korrupsionin e një politikani të pushtetshëm.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Gjahtarja demon
programme.desc: Në Kinën e lashtë, gjatë periudhës së dinastisë Han, një gjeneral shpëton një vazjë të re, pa e ditur se ajo është një demon që ushqehet me zemrat e njerëzve.
programme.category: Thriller
fantazi

programme.title: Pushteti i pestë
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch, Daniel Brühl. Kjo është historia e vërtetë sesi krijuesit e WikiLeaks, Julian Assange dhe Daniel Berg rrezikuan jetët e tyre dhe të shumë njerëzve të tjerë, për të nxjerrë në shesh të vërtetën...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Perrieri do hakmarrje
programme.desc: Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson, Jim Broadbent. Një batakçi, babai i tij i sëmurë dhe fqinja e tyre bukuroshe, përpiqen t'i shmangen një gangsteri me emër, i cili kërkon hakmarrje për vrasjen e një prej ushtarëve të tij...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Përmbytja fatale
programme.desc: 1998. Robert Duvall, Tea Leoni, Morgan Freeman. Kur një grup astronomësh zbulojnë se nje komete gjigande do te godase tokën, e gjithë raca njerëzore nis të numëroje ditët. Të gjithë do të rendin dhe lufta për mbijetesë është e hapur.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Romancë e përgjakur
programme.desc: Historia misterioze e dashurisë, të një çifti të rinjsh, me gjendje ekonomiko -sociale të ndryshme, në Nju Jorkun e viteve 80-të.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Alarm i kuq
programme.desc: Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington. Kandidat për 3 çmime Oskar. Në një nëndetëse bërthamore Amerikane një oficer i ri ngre krye për të ndaluar kapitenin e tij, i cili ngutet të sulmojë pa konfirmuar urdhrin e dhënë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Zoti i luftës
programme.desc: N.Cage, E.Hawke. Për të hyrë në luftë, duhen armë. Juri Orlov është një biznesmen ndërkombëtar dhe trafikant armësh në tetë nga vatrat më të nxehta të konflikteve në botë. Një agjent i Interpolit është vënë në ndjekje të tij.
programme.category: Lufte

programme.title: Succession
Nasljeđe
programme.desc:
Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin, Peter Friedman. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maniepranav"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another HBO drama destined for prestige TV status.","reviewBody":"Why I was attracted to watching Succession in the first place was because I had heard that it had no likeable characters. Coupled with a backdrop of corporate America, it seemed like a show right up my alley. I had absolutely no idea that the show would exceed my expectations by a large mile.

Not since The Sopranos have I seen an interplay of character dynamics this good, especially the toxic traits of those characters. Every little interaction is important, and affects another character on some or the other level significantly. Succession makes sure that behind the gaudy, showy nature of the Roy family, the ugliness of their existence is visible to you, even in the most subtle ways. The show both revels in and critiques the world it bases itself in. And I don't remember a character-driven drama being this thrilling. Hostile takeovers are usually not exciting to people uninterested in the financial world, but this show makes sure you understand the stakes involved. Like, Breaking Bad-level of tense.

Of course, much of this is possible because of the phenomenal cast. I want Jeremy Strong to win an Emmy this year so badly. Kendall Roy is one of the most brilliant (and surprisingly sympathetic) characters I've seen, a mixture of Christopher Moltisanti and Jesse Pinkman, with a slice of your average venture capitalist. I just hope it doesn't typecast him as a Wall Street-type, although I love him in The Big Short too. I want him to win more than Brian Cox, who scares the living daylights out of me as Logan Roy when he merely enters a room. Then there's Sarah Snook as the prideful Shiv, an excellent, pitch-perfect arc like no other. And my man Kieran Culkin as the foul-mouthed-but-concerned Roman, another truly surprising sympathetic turn. And of course, when I talk about Roman, I will talk about Gerri, a role that actress J Smith Cameron absolutely kills, and should have received an Emmy nomination for. And this paragraph is incomplete without my love for Matthew McFadyen and Nicholas Braun in the most hilariously paired people that are Tom and (cousin) Greg since Chris and Paulie Walnuts.

Succession doesn't mince words (or chicken hahahaha). Nothing on the script feels wasted. And the insults are ingenious. As long as Jesse Armstrong remains showrunner, this show will surprise us in the most insane of ways. The research shows (the writers' room is apparently asked to read the Financial Times everyday), and it adds to the authenticity of the show, one which I appreciate. I would also be stupid not to talk about the best original opening theme I have ever heard in any TV show. Nicholas Britell has made a masterful score which does not sound excessive at all. Much like in Mr Robot, the score amplifies the mood.

If you're watching Succession, don't be thrown off by the first 2 episodes of the show (I actually like them). Give it time, because by the 6th episode you'll probably fall off your bed. And come season 2 (which I consider one of the greatest executions of anything in television history because it's flawless), you'll drop your jaw every 25-30 minutes of screentime, which is basically every halftime moment of an episode.

Succession deserves every honor coming its way. HBO has landed another absolute winner in its roster, one that will likely age extremely well with a season or two and be compared to the other Golden Age dramas of this generation. Yes, by that, I mean shows like Mad Men, Breaking Bad, The Leftovers, and maybe, just maybe, The Wire and The Sopranos. Good call on ditching Westworld for marketing this, HBO. This is arguably going to be my favorite deconstruction of capitalism right now.

I can't wait for season 3 at all. I'm just going to rewatch season 2 till then. All the white kids fight for a kiss from daddy, and that might not sell the show a lot. But the fight spins into so many nuances it's hard to look away and just dismiss them as that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81703,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001085/","name":"Kieran Culkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. Tensions rise as a bitter corporate battle threatens to turn into a family civil war."}}</script><metacontent="

As long as Jesse Armstrong remains showrunner, this show will surprise us in the most insane of ways. The research shows (the writers' room is apparently asked to read the Financial Times everyday), and it adds to the authenticity of the show, one which I appreciate. I would also be stupid not to talk about the best original opening theme I have ever heard in any TV show. Nicholas Britell has made a masterful score which does not sound excessive at all. Much like in Mr Robot, the score amplifies the mood.

If you're watching Succession, don't be thrown off by the first 2 episodes of the show (I actually like them). Give it time, because by the 6th episode you'll probably fall off your bed. And come season 2 (which I consider one of the greatest executions of anything in television history because it's flawless), you'll drop your jaw every 25-30 minutes of screentime, which is basically every halftime moment of an episode.

Succession deserves every honor coming its way. HBO has landed another absolute winner in its roster, one that will likely age extremely well with a season or two and be compared to the other Golden Age dramas of this generation. Yes, by that, I mean shows like Mad Men, Breaking Bad, The Leftovers, and maybe, just maybe, The Wire and The Sopranos. Good call on ditching Westworld for marketing this, HBO. This is arguably going to be my favorite deconstruction of capitalism right now.

I can't wait for season 3 at all. I'm just going to rewatch season 2 till then. All the white kids fight for a kiss from daddy, and that might not sell the show a lot. But the fight spins into so many nuances it's hard to look away and just dismiss them as that.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81703,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001085/","name":"Kieran Culkin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. Tensions rise as a bitter corporate battle threatens to turn into a family civil war."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wo hu cang long
Tigar i zmaj
programme.desc:
Wo hu cang long: Directed by Ang Lee. With Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chang Chen. A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190332/","name":"Wo hu cang long","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdhMzMxOTctNDMyNS00NTZmLTljNWEtNTc4MDBmZTYxY2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Larry-17"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Magical Romance...","reviewBody":"There's a telling moment near the beginning of Ang Lee's "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon."

In closeup, we see the rough-hewn, heavy wooden wheels of a peasant cart. They nestle in deep ruts worn into the stone paving blocks of a roadway entering a gated city. The cart rumbles on, its wheels fitting perfectly into the grooves worn by unspoken centuries of just such passing wagons...in one image we see how tradition creates its own paths, how contemporary reality is fabricated to fit such traditions... The camera rises, we see an almost impossible panorama of Peking, the Forbidden City spreading out before us like an Oz extending to the horizon.

What a film this is: a superb action adventure romance with terrific acting and a much-welcome heart underlying the technical superiority.

"Crouching Tiger...", I am told, is representative of a specific literary/cinematic genre in China: Wu Xia...the wizard/warrior piece...magic and martial arts blended. I'm not familiar with the form, but the world portrayed here is a breathtakingly fantastical one. The story is putatively set in 19th century China, but it could be anywhere, anywhen. It is a place of high honor and deep feelings, a place where people are bound by traditions and held captive by their forms. It is also a place of wild and mythic landscapes...from stark desert (thought nowhere do we get that featureless, wide-screen linear horizon seen in David Lean's "Lawrence of Arabia!") to magic misty green mountains with deep dark lakes and steeply cascading streams that come braiding, tumbling down the rockslide heights. High, reedy bamboo forests wave, wondrous, in sighing winds.

In this world people may do amazing things. The flying in this movie -- properly called "wire work" in film terms -- is fantastic. This technique, of course, was not invented by the Wachowski's, but the choreographer of "Crouching Tiger...", Woo-ping Yuen, also staged the wire-fights of "Matrix." Here, the ability of our warrior heros and villains to climb walls, to leap to the rooftops and soar from building to building -- not to mention engaging each other in aerial combat that soars from the peak of a mountain top to the rocks of a mountain stream in a single take -- or to duel on the very tips of dipping, waving bamboo trees -- looks almost plausible, just over the border of the possible, at least. The whole packed-in audience at the big theater at the advanced screening at Pipers Alley in Chicago burst into spontaneous applause several times throughout...

At other moments, I found myself in weepy transport. As I think of the fight in the treetops, right now, I become drippy -- tingly of eye and sinus.

Apart from all else, this is grand storytelling! It has passion, love, revenge...it expresses deep need and longing.

And, yes, the woman are the action hearts of the film! Michelle Yeoh is wonderful...but I've been in love with her for years. Here, she is more mature, quieter, wiser than in any role I've seen her in. Her performance is strong and moving, her face registering, magically, a range of conflicting emotions, hidden secrets, crouching angers, all at once. In acting training we were always told you can't do that. She does it.

Chow Yun Fat, too...I've been a fan of his since I first discovered John Woo's Hong Kong crime thrillers...is the best I've ever seen, as well...magnificent in his silences. Strength without cruelty.

The center of the film is a girl who looks to be about 15! Ziyi Zhang whose date of birth is given as 1979. Zhang is from Beijing, China, and has only one other film credit. She is remarkable. Her story is the film's binding element. And this newcomer holds it together! Holding her own with Yeoh and Chow in both dramatic material and in the balletic martial pas des dieux's that frame the conflicts between characters. She is the "Luke Skywalker" of the piece, if you will...though "Crouching Tiger..." has everything the "Star Wars" saga aspires to: excitement, thrills and magic. Here however, technical fireworks are wrapped heart and deeply resonant spirit. Elements Lukasfilm wanted to have, but which it succeeded in providing only in the most self-conscious way.

By the way: this is an action film, almost uniquely without violence...or, rather, the violence is so stylized, so removed into some mystical realm, that it almost disappears into dance. There is, I believe, only one small splash of blood on-screen. Typically, I don't like that -- figuring that if you're going to do a film where violence is part of it all, where action advances plot, let's have it full-bore, the "Full Peckinpaw," if you will. Here, however, this stylization works beautifully with action sequences that take the breath away and inspire a sense of awe, rather than simply leave you white-knuckled and sweaty.

There are those who will grumble that Jackie Chan (another favorite of mine) does it all for real, without wires and tricks. True enough... But here that exuberance of motion is in service of a grand story and strong characters who carry worthwhile emotional burdens!

I won't be able to wait for the DVD, and will probably see it again, perhaps see it twice before it hits the home-market.

My recommendation: Just go see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-03-21","keywords":"china,female martial artist,defying gravity,tragic hero,mixed martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1046455321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000334/","name":"Chow Yun-Fat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955471/","name":"Ziyi Zhang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041248/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0874631/","name":"Kuo Jung Tsai"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim... U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim 1980-ima - eri hedonizma i želje za posjedovanjem. Iako je u potpunosti razvila svoje moći, ona ostaje pritajena, bavi se prikupljanjem drevnih artefakta, a herojska djela izvodi samo potajno. Međutim, Diana će uskoro morati skupiti svu svoju snagu, mudrost i hrabrost kad se sukobi s Maxwellom Lordom i Cheetom, zlikovkom koja posjeduje nadljudsku snagu i spretnost.

credits.actor: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Natasha Alford, Todd Bilgore, Lillian Bonsignore, Katherine Borowitz, George W. Bush, Paula Clarke, Anderson Cooper

Chow Yun Fat, too...I've been a fan of his since I first discovered John Woo's Hong Kong crime thrillers...is the best I've ever seen, as well...magnificent in his silences. Strength without cruelty.

I won't be able to wait for the DVD, and will probably see it again, perhaps see it twice before it hits the home-market.

My recommendation: Just go see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-03-21","keywords":"china,female martial artist,defying gravity,tragic hero,mixed martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1046455321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000334/","name":"Chow Yun-Fat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955471/","name":"Ziyi Zhang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041248/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0874631/","name":"Kuo Jung Tsai"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0190332, Title: Wo hu cang long, --- Description: Wo hu cang long: Directed by Ang Lee. With Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chang Chen. A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190332/","name":"Wo hu cang long","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdhMzMxOTctNDMyNS00NTZmLTljNWEtNTc4MDBmZTYxY2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190332/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Larry-17","dateCreated":"2001-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Magical Romance...","reviewBody":"There's a telling moment near the beginning of Ang Lee's "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon."

In closeup, we see the rough-hewn, heavy wooden wheels of a peasant cart. They nestle in deep ruts worn into the stone paving blocks of a roadway entering a gated city. The cart rumbles on, its wheels fitting perfectly into the grooves worn by unspoken centuries of just such passing wagons...in one image we see how tradition creates its own paths, how contemporary reality is fabricated to fit such traditions... The camera rises, we see an almost impossible panorama of Peking, the Forbidden City spreading out before us like an Oz extending to the horizon.

What a film this is: a superb action adventure romance with terrific acting and a much-welcome heart underlying the technical superiority.

"Crouching Tiger...", I am told, is representative of a specific literary/cinematic genre in China: Wu Xia...the wizard/warrior piece...magic and martial arts blended. I'm not familiar with the form, but the world portrayed here is a breathtakingly fantastical one. The story is putatively set in 19th century China, but it could be anywhere, anywhen. It is a place of high honor and deep feelings, a place where people are bound by traditions and held captive by their forms. It is also a place of wild and mythic landscapes...from stark desert (thought nowhere do we get that featureless, wide-screen linear horizon seen in David Lean's "Lawrence of Arabia!") to magic misty green mountains with deep dark lakes and steeply cascading streams that come braiding, tumbling down the rockslide heights. High, reedy bamboo forests wave, wondrous, in sighing winds.

In this world people may do amazing things. The flying in this movie -- properly called "wire work" in film terms -- is fantastic. This technique, of course, was not invented by the Wachowski's, but the choreographer of "Crouching Tiger...", Woo-ping Yuen, also staged the wire-fights of "Matrix." Here, the ability of our warrior heros and villains to climb walls, to leap to the rooftops and soar from building to building -- not to mention engaging each other in aerial combat that soars from the peak of a mountain top to the rocks of a mountain stream in a single take -- or to duel on the very tips of dipping, waving bamboo trees -- looks almost plausible, just over the border of the possible, at least. The whole packed-in audience at the big theater at the advanced screening at Pipers Alley in Chicago burst into spontaneous applause several times throughout...

At other moments, I found myself in weepy transport. As I think of the fight in the treetops, right now, I become drippy -- tingly of eye and sinus.

Apart from all else, this is grand storytelling! It has passion, love, revenge...it expresses deep need and longing.

And, yes, the woman are the action hearts of the film! Michelle Yeoh is wonderful...but I've been in love with her for years. Here, she is more mature, quieter, wiser than in any role I've seen her in. Her performance is strong and moving, her face registering, magically, a range of conflicting emotions, hidden secrets, crouching angers, all at once. In acting training we were always told you can't do that. She does it.

Chow Yun Fat, too...I've been a fan of his since I first discovered John Woo's Hong Kong crime thrillers...is the best I've ever seen, as well...magnificent in his silences. Strength without cruelty.

The center of the film is a girl who looks to be about 15! Ziyi Zhang whose date of birth is given as 1979. Zhang is from Beijing, China, and has only one other film credit. She is remarkable. Her story is the film's binding element. And this newcomer holds it together! Holding her own with Yeoh and Chow in both dramatic material and in the balletic martial pas des dieux's that frame the conflicts between characters. She is the "Luke Skywalker" of the piece, if you will...though "Crouching Tiger..." has everything the "Star Wars" saga aspires to: excitement, thrills and magic. Here however, technical fireworks are wrapped heart and deeply resonant spirit. Elements Lukasfilm wanted to have, but which it succeeded in providing only in the most self-conscious way.

By the way: this is an action film, almost uniquely without violence...or, rather, the violence is so stylized, so removed into some mystical realm, that it almost disappears into dance. There is, I believe, only one small splash of blood on-screen. Typically, I don't like that -- figuring that if you're going to do a film where violence is part of it all, where action advances plot, let's have it full-bore, the "Full Peckinpaw," if you will. Here, however, this stylization works beautifully with action sequences that take the breath away and inspire a sense of awe, rather than simply leave you white-knuckled and sweaty.

There are those who will grumble that Jackie Chan (another favorite of mine) does it all for real, without wires and tricks. True enough... But here that exuberance of motion is in service of a grand story and strong characters who carry worthwhile emotional burdens!

I won't be able to wait for the DVD, and will probably see it again, perhaps see it twice before it hits the home-market.

My recommendation: Just go see it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-03-21","keywords":"china,female martial artist,defying gravity,tragic hero,mixed martial arts","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1046455321","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000334/","name":"Chow Yun-Fat","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955471/","name":"Ziyi Zhang"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041248/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0874631/","name":"Kuo Jung Tsai"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Witches
Vještice Roalda Dahla
programme.desc:
The Witches: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Chris Rock, Jahzir Bruno, Octavia Spencer, Brian Bovell. A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805647/","name":"The Witches","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYjlhMjEtYzIwOC00ZWYzLTgyMmQtYjI5M2UzNDJkNTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805647/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please make these awful remakes stop.","reviewBody":"Oh Dear,

This should have been good, it needed to be good, sadly it just isn't. It's one of those films where a remake didn't seem to be necessary, but as someone that loved Roald Dahl as a child my interest was peaked.

It's inconsistent throughout, did they perhaps rush it because of Covid? The special effects look decent in parts, and woeful in others, Anne Hathaway displays personality it's fair to say, but her accent..... If anyone remembers Rentaghost, think Miss Popov, she spans countries from Ireland to Russia, it had me chuckling.

Once again, please, please try and give us something new and original, stop taking things that have already been made, and making them ten times worse. An extra point for casting the wonderful Josette Simon.

It made me want to watch Anjelica Huston.

I paid to download it, that money could have gone on something less awful, like a Donny Osmond cd.

Naff, 3/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"based on novel,witch,european literature on screen,taking off shoes,barefoot female","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1302249753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In late 1967, a young orphaned boy (Bruno) goes to live with his Grandma (Spencer) in the rural Alabama town of Demopolis. As the boy and his grandmother encounter some deceptively glamorous but thoroughly diabolical witches, she wisely whisks our young hero away to an opulent seaside resort. Regrettably, they arrive at precisely the same time that the world's Grand High Witch (Hathaway) has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe to carry out her nefarious plans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0818055/","name":"Octavia Spencer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1244069/","name":"Kenya Barris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Succession
Nasljeđe
programme.desc:
Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin, Peter Friedman. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maniepranav"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another HBO drama destined for prestige TV status.","reviewBody":"Why I was attracted to watching Succession in the first place was because I had heard that it had no likeable characters. Coupled with a backdrop of corporate America, it seemed like a show right up my alley. I had absolutely no idea that the show would exceed my expectations by a large mile.

Not since The Sopranos have I seen an interplay of character dynamics this good, especially the toxic traits of those characters. Every little interaction is important, and affects another character on some or the other level significantly. Succession makes sure that behind the gaudy, showy nature of the Roy family, the ugliness of their existence is visible to you, even in the most subtle ways. The show both revels in and critiques the world it bases itself in. And I don't remember a character-driven drama being this thrilling. Hostile takeovers are usually not exciting to people uninterested in the financial world, but this show makes sure you understand the stakes involved. Like, Breaking Bad-level of tense.

Of course, much of this is possible because of the phenomenal cast. I want Jeremy Strong to win an Emmy this year so badly. Kendall Roy is one of the most brilliant (and surprisingly sympathetic) characters I've seen, a mixture of Christopher Moltisanti and Jesse Pinkman, with a slice of your average venture capitalist. I just hope it doesn't typecast him as a Wall Street-type, although I love him in The Big Short too. I want him to win more than Brian Cox, who scares the living daylights out of me as Logan Roy when he merely enters a room. Then there's Sarah Snook as the prideful Shiv, an excellent, pitch-perfect arc like no other. And my man Kieran Culkin as the foul-mouthed-but-concerned Roman, another truly surprising sympathetic turn. And of course, when I talk about Roman, I will talk about Gerri, a role that actress J Smith Cameron absolutely kills, and should have received an Emmy nomination for. And this paragraph is incomplete without my love for Matthew McFadyen and Nicholas Braun in the most hilariously paired people that are Tom and (cousin) Greg since Chris and Paulie Walnuts.

Succession doesn't mince words (or chicken hahahaha). Nothing on the script feels wasted. And the insults are ingenious. As long as Jesse Armstrong remains showrunner, this show will surprise us in the most insane of ways. The research shows (the writers' room is apparently asked to read the Financial Times everyday), and it adds to the authenticity of the show, one which I appreciate. I would also be stupid not to talk about the best original opening theme I have ever heard in any TV show. Nicholas Britell has made a masterful score which does not sound excessive at all. Much like in Mr Robot, the score amplifies the mood.

If you're watching Succession, don't be thrown off by the first 2 episodes of the show (I actually like them). Give it time, because by the 6th episode you'll probably fall off your bed. And come season 2 (which I consider one of the greatest executions of anything in television history because it's flawless), you'll drop your jaw every 25-30 minutes of screentime, which is basically every halftime moment of an episode.

Succession deserves every honor coming its way. HBO has landed another absolute winner in its roster, one that will likely age extremely well with a season or two and be compared to the other Golden Age dramas of this generation. Yes, by that, I mean shows like Mad Men, Breaking Bad, The Leftovers, and maybe, just maybe, The Wire and The Sopranos. Good call on ditching Westworld for marketing this, HBO. This is arguably going to be my favorite deconstruction of capitalism right now.

I can't wait for season 3 at all. I'm just going to rewatch season 2 till then. All the white kids fight for a kiss from daddy, and that might not sell the show a lot. But the fight spins into so many nuances it's hard to look away and just dismiss them as that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81703,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001085/","name":"Kieran Culkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. Tensions rise as a bitter corporate battle threatens to turn into a family civil war."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a.... Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Iako je sputava Molly, dugogodišnja najbolja prijateljica i korporativna odvjetnica koja se sjajno snalazi pred raznim odborima, ali ne i s osjećajima, Issa je strastvena graditeljica zajednice iz Inglewooda čija neodlučnost često omete njezinu viziju. Radnja se nastavlja nedugo nakon što su obje prijateljice dobile nogu od svojih partnera. Peta i posljednja sezona prati naše glavne junakinje, uz smiješnu Kelli i zahtjevnu Tiffany, kako pokušavaju stati na noge i nastaviti sa životom.

programme.title: Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larryja Davida u ovoj hvaljenoj humorističnoj seriji u verité stilu koja ga prati kod kuće, na poslu i po gradu dok se suočava s raznim problemima s izmišljenim i stvarnim ličnostima. U sporednim ulogama glume Jeff Garlin i Cheryl Hines.

programme.title: The New Mutants
Novi mutanti
programme.desc: The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sara-691"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie desperately needed whatever they edited out.","reviewBody":"It was an OK movie all in all, but it could've been SO much better. I was personally stoked for a horror mutants movie, but this is as much horror as any other superhero movie (and less than some) so I must say I was very disappointed. The idea of was there and it could've been SO SO good but in the end, it wasn't...\n\nA thing that really distracted me was the actors weird accents. You have a group of really good actors here but the bad accents made them just seem mediocre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: Ovaj animirani "Disneyjev" klasik priča je o snalažljivom lopovu Aladinu koji se zaljubi u sultanovu kćer i krene na epsko putovanje da osvoji njezinu ruku. No tijekom potrage Aladin nije ni svjestan... Ovaj animirani "Disneyjev" klasik priča je o snalažljivom lopovu Aladinu koji se zaljubi u sultanovu kćer i krene na epsko putovanje da osvoji njezinu ruku. No tijekom potrage Aladin nije ni svjestan da je zapravo pijun u rukama zlog vezira Jafara koji treba njegovu pomoć da izvuče tajanstvenu svjetiljku iz Pećine čuda. Umjesto toga, Aladin otkriva da je tajna svjetiljke šaljivi Duh koji mu ponudi ispuniti tri želje. Ali prije nego što ih stigne sve iskoristiti, Jafar ukrade svjetiljku pa Aladin mora nadmudriti vezira da spasi sultanovu kraljevinu.

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?
